title: 13-hour water cut in Aluthgama, Mathugama, & Agalawatte
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A 13-hour water cut will be imposed for several areas in Aluthgama, Mathugama, and Agalawatte from 8 AM on Thursday (9), to 9 PM the same day.

Wadduwa, Waskaduwa, Pothupitiya, Kalutara (North), Kalutara (South), Katukurunda, Nagoda, Bombuwala, Pilaminawatte, Payagala, Maggona, Beruwala, Moragalla, Aluthgama, Darga Town, Bentota, and Kaluwamodara.
The water cut is due to essential maintenance by the Ceylon Electricity Board.
